subject: Re: [junit] xUnit results in XML
msgSnippet: ... take a look at Gump (http://jakarta.apache.org/gump/) and continuous integration (http://www.martinfowler.com/articles/continuousIntegration.html).  It s
messageBody:
> We need to publish the results in one comprehensive format. We are
> looking at extending each tool to output a "standard" XML format that
> will be later digested and published.


take a look at Gump (http://jakarta.apache.org/gump/) and continuous
integration
(http://www.martinfowler.com/articles/continuousIntegration.html). It's
not exactly what you want to do but certainly the fastest way to go. I
don't know how well it works to execute non-java programs (especially
VBUnit) but it souldn't be an insolvable problem.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
